name: mutationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to mutation (= change in genes or organisms): Their hypothesis was based on studies of mutationally induced changes. Mutationally altered genes were found in the tumours.
More examplesFewer examplesThe antibodies were tested against the mutationally altered protein.The mutationally resistant bacteria showed changes in amino acids.All the mutationally changed proteins were catalytically inactive.He studied mutationally altered forms of the enzyme.Most essential human genes are mutationally stable.
